## About
Vicki Zhang is a senior full stack software engineer building agents at work and in spare time. Hippogriff.io is a site for things made on the journey of reimagining human & app interaction.

## Projects
- TypeCraft: A Space Invaders typing game that showcases how a small, well-crafted app can make a routine task more fun. https://typecraft.hippogriff.io

## Blog
Posts on software engineering, AI, agents, and building things.

## Contact
